name: Introvert vs. Extrovert
description: Choose your identity, then battle it out with you ideological opposite. Introverts gain energy when alone and lose it when surrounded by others; extroverts are the opposite. Dash in and out of your safe space, and drop barriers to corral the crowds (and your opponent!). Collect powerups ranging from your trusty cellphone to books to beer, the all-important social lubricant!
